Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
CIrrCCThe central class of IrrConfigController This class is used to provide the use configurable Irrlicht controller. Controller items can be defined, and the user will be able to change the controls using a GUI provided by this class. Controls can be grouped into several sets, but this does only influence the creation of the GUI
CStateDemo
CStateMachineMy finite state machine This class handles various game states
